attributes.action: Make revenge porn illegal in Northern Ireland.
attributes.additional_details: Prosecute those sharing explicit images without consent. Add individuals partaking in these activities on the sex offenders register.
attributes.background: After the recent discovery of forums sharing leaked nudes of local women on apps. It is time for the Northern Ireland assembley take action to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for.

If you want to raise this issue you could contact your MLA, or raise it with the Northern Ireland Executive.

You can find contact details for your MLAs here: http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/

You can find contact details for the departments of the Northern Ireland Executive here: https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/contacts/government-departments-in-northern-ireland
